short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import full Le Monde articles in LingQ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For subscribers of LeMonde.fr, this extension supports full article imports into LingQ. Simply click the extension icon when on an article page, choose the LingQ course to which you want to import, and click the Import button.

The LingQ API does take a few seconds to complete the import. The button will indicate when the import is complete.

For personal use only. Please adhere to LeMonde subscription guidelines.
